channel.title: AmericanDream on Tales of a technology enthusiast
channel.description: Recent content in AmericanDream on Tales of a technology enthusiast

item.title: About Diversity...
item.description: Diversity is a word we are hearing more and more in the Enterprise world as well as in media. Hopefully for the best, as talking and debating about a social problem is likely to drive progress.

item.title: Goodbye 2017!
item.description: December 31st. There are few hours left before the New Year, kids are having a nap, house is quiet. Probably the right time to reflect upon 2017, another crazy year with so many things that happened.
